texts.description: This file defines the MAM system information that must be localized.

text.description: The Language HTML Meta tag definition. This tag is used by MTMSIX.DLL.
The LCID of the locale that IIS should use. This effects formatting and should match format specifieds below. Leave blank to not set a LCID and just accept the default.
Special date format used by javascript based calendar widget.Note this format is slightly different than VB's format. See MDM/Common/Widgets/Calendar/date.js for more information.
Special date format used by javascript based calendar widget.Note this format is slightly different than VB's format. See MDM/Common/Widgets/Calendar/date.js for more information.
Use 24 hour clock (value=true) or AM/PM based clock (value=false).
Do not remove the space at the begin
The date format used all accross the application. See the Visual Basic Format instructor for more help.
The time and date format used all accross the application. See the Visual Basic Format instructor for more help.
The amount format used all accross the application. See the Visual Basic Format instructor for more help.
The decimal separator. Used by MDM Client Side (JavaScript).
The 1000 separator. Used by MDM Client Side (JavaScript).
Number of digits after the decimal point for decimal. Used by MDM Client Side (JavaScript).
Number of digits before the decimal point for decimal. Used by MDM Client Side (JavaScript).
Define if the day light saving mode must be used when the date are localized.
